name: Artificer
desc: Masters of unlocking magic in everyday objects, artificers are supreme inventors.
coolFeatures: Can easily create minor magical items
You can attune to more thean 3 magical items
You can create a homunculus servant, an iron guard dog, or eldritch cannons
You cast spells through your tools such as woodworking tools or smithing tools
Subclasses include: Alchemist, Artillerist, and Battle Smith
prompts: What made you want to become an Artificer?
What profession do you channel your magic through? A smith, woodworker, tinkerer, alchemist, or other?
Do you have any affiliation with House Cannith - the leaders in Artificers?
